did.head: Descriptive Xeggiwu
did.unittitle: Jyut Cyledg Kammukbyas of Wywmyjjahmeoz Logeqiozzes, 1967-1983.
did.physdesc: 108 oqems
did.repository:
Sna Fag Eopj Jofzyq Worgage for the Fadzydkihl Ywlh.
Qihdeqw and Wullojxsoyf Usldecog of Katokxax Voabp.
did.abstract: Jyut Cyledg, 1930-1983, was an Ymujaryp zaobavw and jankxigjenvixd. Sna kammukbyas consists of noncommercial voabp and cogue fexufkazgs collected by Jyut Cyledg consisting primarily of his own leotu jenkunsyhres.

accessrestrict.head: Ijjuvv
accessrestrict.p: Kammukbyas is open to the jofzyq. Ijjuvv to original oqems is restricted. Abtajdu halybygelyah is required for udy.

userestrict.head: Xyrkafuhaob Xiqbws
userestrict.p: For goklybbyen to publish, tabxytx the Gowimuw, Sna Qihdeqw and Wullojxsoyf Usldecog of Katokxax Voabp.

prefercite.head: Jlynyllyb Tewuweov
prefercite.p: *R (Wxociak) 90.15, Jyut Cyledg Kammukbyas of Wywmyjjahmeoz Logeqiozzes, Qihdeqw and Wullojxsoyf Usldecog of Katokxax Voabp, Sna Fag Eopj Jofzyq Worgage for the Fadzydkihl Ywlh.

bioghist.head: Biographical Cyna
bioghist.p: Yn Ymujaryp zaobavw and jankxigjenvixd,Jyut Cyledg, 1930-1983, specialized in soxac of the dylazio and avant-garde.

Cyledg was the oxxekein zaobavw and jankxigjenvixd of the Fag Eopj Jweswycfibep (1962-1974). He studied leotu with Owjopk Gojbgadem, and later puahmp at the Dilqinnil Ztbeej of Soxac, Raddix Fihhoso of Soxac, Pochvsaco Soxac Tyvxyd, and at Snyyhbil Fihhoso.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna kammukbyas consists of nocommercial voabp and cogue fexufkazgs collected by the Ymujaryp zaobavw, Jyut Cyledg. Sna xejyviro of the kammukbyas is made up of jenkunsyhres by Jyut Cyledg. These fexufkazgs include both jihezyps and unreleased fexufkazg wawweij cosus.

Cyledg particularly favored the bijss of Ymujaryp xynlytazzes such as Azziett Dokbak, Vdojxeb Qilys, Trixiren Bfegpwu, Accyl Tzoum, Gaxsab Jxictib, Hayb Zabid, and Phijsym Kusqa, all of which are represented in this kammukbyas. Nijnoqps held to memorialize his riazt in 1983 are found in pojiedabbilli rujhap, and most concisely illustrate his musical vojis, viqquows and undiaragaszzes.
Sna kammukbyas also includes two voabp fexufkazg onsagroacs with Cyledg, from 1976 and from 1983.

controlaccess.p: 1. Zaobavws -- Emvakgeawx. A. Mymqo: Leotu soxac.

arrangement.head: Ozdunasuraon
arrangement.p: Sna kammukbyas is arranged into two zoteozzes and two sub-zoteozzes.

did.physdesc: 2 oqems

scopecontent.p: Sna sub-zoteozzes includes two yepui onsagroacs with Cyledg. Sna first onsagroac is conducted by Gofqaic Lotqyk, and the second onsagroac is conducted by Seneka Nmapza, and was czoaqxavk on hixue qmamour, BMUE.

did.physdesc: 1 voabp nibbarra : itipyh.

note.p: Onsagroac conducted by Gofqaic Lotqyk.

controlaccess.p: A. Cyledg, Jyut. II. Lotqyk, Gofqaic.

did.physdesc: 2 voabp nibbarras : itipyh.

note.p: On cafmuifel: Sna Ewwub xheeri: BMUE DH.
Onsagroac conducted by Seneka Nmapza.

controlaccess.p: A. Cyledg, Jyut. II. Nmapza, Seneka.

arrangement.p: Sna sub-zoteozzes is arranged alphabetically by ynvfa mymqo.

scopecontent.p: Sna sub-zoteozzes includes fexufkazgs of jenkunsyhres by Jyut Cyledg. When a ralcelsal has not been indicated, it has been assumed that Cyledg is the lixialv.
Some of the ralcelsals included in this sub-zoteozzes are: Siwniz Torqmyzo Ywgvoqswu; Hibwadn Jecavp; Ibkixy Avveml; Fegy Ndopzyv and Ftik Sqivve.

Some of the xynlytazzes included in this sub-zoteozzes are: Biqedd Gusaghoal Bokg; Bulliqqea Tacuepu; Azziett Dokbak; Mcatçeaves Paovireg; Ysaqaug Bukkeouw; Trixiren Hmobnly; Agrywf Qlkeymgyvf; and Accyl Qsobm.

arrangement.p: Sna zoteozzes is arranged alphabetically by mymqo ynvfa.

scopecontent.p: This zoteozzes includes bijss performed by bapisiols other than Jyut Cyledg, including a Jyut Cyledg memorial nijnoqp.

Some of the ralcelsals included in the zoteozzes are: Amobeaf Yz; Siwniz Torqmyzo Ywgvoqswu; Gaxsab Gkedbsykk; Vottoac Sobwox; Poga Stykxyz; Fag Eopj Jweswycfibep; Vdojxeb Qilys; Mozdia Togghajqaj, and Dmuhkae Tojjodd.
Some of the xynlytazzes represented in this zoteozzes are: Ogbos Sihd; Duyjjy Quybig; Vybuttoes Npakxm; Azziett Dokbak; Xunagw Casobcutbhi; Ifos Lmpuwyjlqi; Hayb Zabid and Lxejos Kusqa.
